name: This Is Just A Statement
description:
I've never had a personal interest in Renaissance art. I still have my respect to the previous artists, but somehow their works have no emotional connection with myself. They are just history in art lessons. A marker of their time indeed. But do I want to have it? I do not think so. They belong to the museum.

I like art that has a statement. Artwork that have the ability to provoke anyone who sees it. The one that make you feel something. Not just some pretty and fragile things for your fancy house. And here is my statement.
